Beginning of game: Your primary objective is arresting the CEO. However, you should also collect any evidence you find against the head of each department.
You are the second agent we have sent to arrest the CEO. The first one never made it out. Keep an eye out for any evidence of his whereabouts.
There is a whistleblower that has been given the codename TRENCH. Contact him for more information.
The employees here are hostile. I can confirm they are using arcane power.
Nothing we haven't dealt with before. We have enough power stored from the last arcane being we killed to bring you back when you die.
